section.p:
The knife sinks deep into your shoulder. Lose 2-12 Stamina points (the roll of two dice).
You realize at once that the knife was coated with poison, and even a scratch will kill you unless you have a blessing of Immunity to Disease/Poison.
(If you use such a blessing, remember to cross it off your Adventure Sheet.)
